Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
public class Server extends Object
Class Server used to manage new connecting clients, the forwarding of the messages from the socket that handle the client to the right lobby.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Server()
    Constructor Server creates a new Server instance.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createLobby(GameParams gameParams, int clientId)
    Method createLobby is utilized to create a lobby based on the GameParams message received from a client.
    void
    forwardMessage(Request request, int clientID)
    Method forwardMessage receives a request message from a client and sends it to the corresponding lobby.
    Answer
    getLobbies()
    Method getLobbies is used to create the Welcome message that must be sent to all the clients that connect to the server
    void
    handleClientDisconnection(int clientId)
    Method handleClientDisconnection calls the method handleDisconnection of the corresponding lobby then remove from the map id-Socket this client id
    void
    handleJoin(Join join, int clientId)
    Method handleJoin manages a join message from a client, it also handles the re-connection of a client.
    void
    sendMessage(int clientID, Answer answer)
    Method sendMessage sends a message to the client.
    void
    startServer(int port)
    Method startServer is used to start the server on the port given by parameter, then he keeps accepting new connections form clients till the server is alive.

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server()
      Constructor Server creates a new Server instance.

  • Method Details

    • startServer

      public void startServer(int port)
      Method startServer is used to start the server on the port given by parameter, then he keeps accepting new connections form clients till the server is alive.
      Parameters:
      port - int - the port where the server is started.

    • handleClientDisconnection

      public void handleClientDisconnection(int clientId)
      Method handleClientDisconnection calls the method handleDisconnection of the corresponding lobby then remove from the map id-Socket this client id
      Parameters:
      clientId - int - the id of the client who has to be disconnected.

    • handleJoin

      public void handleJoin(Join join, int clientId)
      Method handleJoin manages a join message from a client, it also handles the re-connection of a client.
      Parameters:
      join - Join - the join message sent by the client.
      clientId - int - the client's id that sent the join to the server.

    • forwardMessage

      public void forwardMessage(Request request, int clientID)
      Method forwardMessage receives a request message from a client and sends it to the corresponding lobby.
      Parameters:
      request - Request - the message that has to be forwarded.
      clientID - int - the client's id that sent the request to the server.

    • createLobby

      public void createLobby(GameParams gameParams, int clientId)
      Method createLobby is utilized to create a lobby based on the GameParams message received from a client.
      Parameters:
      gameParams - GameParams - the message that is used to create the lobby.
      clientId - int - the client's id that sent the message to the server.

    • getLobbies

      public Answer getLobbies()
      Method getLobbies is used to create the Welcome message that must be sent to all the clients that connect to the server
      Returns:
      Answer - the message containing all the lobbies available with their parameters.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(int clientID, Answer answer)
      Method sendMessage sends a message to the client.
      Parameters:
      clientID - int - the client's id that will receive the answer.
      answer - Answer - the message that has to be sent to the client.
